TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageAdapter extends System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter
Public MustInherit Class PageAdapter Inherits ControlAdapter
public ref class PageAdapter abstract : System::Web::UI::Adapters::ControlAdapter

summary.span: 修改网页以适应特定的浏览器，并提供所有页面适配器可直接或间接继承的基类。

span.span: Adapts a Web page for a specific browser and provides the base class from which all page adapters inherit, directly or indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，可适应某一网页寻求在特定浏览器定义的浏览器使用的标记语言 （例如，HTML 或 XHTML） 的类。The class is an abstract class that adapts a Web page for a specific class of browsers, defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, HTML or XHTML). 呈现行为的适应性很多可以在派生的专用的文本编写器类中封装类，因此它不是始终需要提供页适配器。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized text writer classes that derive from the class, so it is not always necessary to provide a page adapter. 从调用派生的页面适配器的大多数成员类或从控件适配器。Most members of derived page adapters are called from the class or from control adapters. 首先，类或控件适配器检测是否存在派生的页面适配器，然后调用的成员，或如果页适配器不存在提供的功能。First, the class or control adapters detect the presence of the derived page adapter, and then call the member, or provide the functionality if the page adapter is not present. 成员类提供了以下功能：The members of the class provide the following functionality: - 并属性定义其他 HTTP 标头和 HTTP`GET`和`POST`可用于改变缓存的参数。The and properties define additional HTTP headers and HTTP `GET` and `POST` parameters that can be used to vary caching. 在从缓存初始化期间调用它们类。They are called during cache initialization from the class. - 方法返回可用于保留的页的组合的视图和控件状态的对象。The method returns an object that can be used to persist the combined view and control states of the page. 从引用属性派生的页面适配器是否存在。It is referenced from the property if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法提供了可用于引用在脚本中的窗体的 DHTML 代码片段。The method provides a DHTML code fragment that can be used to reference forms in scripts. - 方法返回的回发变量的集合，如果页面在回发。The method returns a collection of the postback variables if the page is in postback. 它由.NET Framework，而不是调用方法派生的页面适配器是否存在。It is called by the .NET Framework instead of the method if a derived page adapter is present. - 和方法使用控件适配器来呈现超链接，如果派生的页面适配器是否存在。The and methods are used by control adapters to render hyperlinks if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法将呈现一个超链接或可以提交窗体的回发的客户端标记。The method renders a hyperlink or postback client tag that can submit the form. - 并方法由单选按钮控件适配器，来引用另单选按钮组中的控件。The and methods are used by radio button control adapters to reference the other controls in a radio button group. - 属性提供访问权限的组合的控件和视图状态通过内部对象`ClientState`属性的类。The property provides access to the combined control and view states of the object through the internal `ClientState` property of the class. - 控件适配器使用方法来执行特定于设备的文本转换。The method is used by control adapters to perform device-specific text transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何派生一个名为类`CustomPageAdapter`从类并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 方法将添加一个名为属性`src`到超链接，其中包含对当前页的引用。The method adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 呈现到页中的所有超链接`CustomPageAdapter`附加将具有`src`属性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 构造此适配器在内部创建相应时类或派生的类。The .NET Framework constructs this adapter internally when it creates the corresponding class or derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByHeaders { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByHeaders
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CacheVaryByHeaders As StringCollection

summary.span: 获取其他 HTTP 标头的列表，对于已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页，缓存将随这些标头而改变。

span.span: Gets a list of additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 包含 HTTP 标头列表的 ，否则为 。

span.span: An that contains a list of HTTP headers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 上找到的实体的可缓存网页缓存多个版本中，根据 HTTP 标头和其他因素。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions, based on the HTTP headers and other factors. 例如，版本生成网页的每种语言通常会被缓存，根据`Accept-Language`HTTP 标头。For example, a version for each language in which a page is generated is typically cached, based on the `Accept-Language` HTTP header. 对于特定浏览器，可能需要改变除了标头的 HTTP 标头的缓存控制独立于目标的缓存。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by HTTP headers in addition to the headers that control target-independent caching. 例如，可能需要缓存不同版本的不同屏幕大小的页。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different screen sizes. 返回的标头名称属性添加到标头的列表上`Vary`HTTP 标头发送到客户端浏览器。The header names returned by the property are added to the list of headers on the `Vary` HTTP header sent to the client browser.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写属性以返回要控制特定于目标的缓存的其他标头的列表。基属性返回。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional headers to control target-specific caching. The base property returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByParams { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByParams

member this.CacheVaryByParams : System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection

summary.span: 从 HTTP GET 和 POST 请求获得其他参数的列表，对于已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页，高速缓存将随这些参数而改变。

span.span: Gets a list of additional parameters from HTTP GET and POST requests by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 包含 GET 和 POST 参数列表的 ；否则为 。

span.span: An that contains a list of the GET and POST parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在缓存网页缓存多个版本 Web 上找到的实体基于，还有其他因素请求参数。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions based on, among other factors, the request parameters. 例如，版本可能会生成网页零售链中的每个存储位置，通常会缓存根据参数名称 (例如， `StoreID`)。For example, a version for each store location within a retail chain for which a page might be generated would typically be cached based on the parameter name (for example, `StoreID`). 对于特定浏览器，它可能需要改变缓存的 GET 或 POST 参数以及参数控制独立于目标的缓存。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by GET or POST parameters in addition to the parameters that control target-independent caching. 例如，可能需要不同的移动电话服务提供商缓存不同版本的页面。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different mobile phone service providers.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写属性以返回一系列其他的 GET 或 POST 参数来控制特定于目标的缓存。基方法返回。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional GET or POST parameters to control target-specific caching. The base method returns .

summary.span: 获取一个经过编码的字符串，其中包含已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页的视图和控件状态数据。

span.span: Gets an encoded string that contains the view and control states data of the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 一个经过编码的 ，其中包含位于相关联的 页面上的控件的组合视图和控件状态。

span.span: An encoded containing the combined view and control states of the controls on the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对内部访问`ClientState`属性的类。The property provides access to the internal `ClientState` property of the class. 视图状态数据存储对象在内部`ClientState`属性的将始终保存在隐藏字段在网页上。View state data stored by the object in the internal `ClientState` property of will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.

span.para: 继承自类，不能重写属性因为它不是。若要修改的行为派生类中实现的新属性，引用基类的属性。

When you inherit from the class, you cannot override the property because it is not . To modify the behavior of in a derived class, implement a new property that references the property of the base class.

summary.span: 确定网页是否在回发模式下，并返回回发变量的名称/值集合。

span.span: Determines whether the Web page is in postback and returns a name/value collection of the postback variables.

returns.span: 如果有回发变量，则为回发变量的 ，否则为 。

span.span: A of the postback variables, if any; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回以下集合之一：The method returns one of the following collections: - 如果 HTTP 数据传输方法的窗体变量是`POST`。Form variables if the HTTP data transfer method is `POST`. - 如果 HTTP 方法位于查询字符串变量`GET`。Query string variables if the HTTP method is `GET`.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法以提供特定于目标的处理的回发变量集合。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to provide target-specific handling of the postback variables collection.

summary.span: 返回使用 POST 或 GET 命令发送到该页的名称/值数据集合，而不执行 ASP.NET 在该请求的请求验证。

span.span: Returns a name-value collection of data that was posted to the page using either a POST or a GET command, without performing ASP.NET request validation on the request.

returns.span: 未经过验证的窗体数据。

span.span: The unvalidated form data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

param.name: formId
param.span: 包含所发送窗体的客户端 ID 的 。

span.span: A containing the client ID of the form that was posted.

summary.span: 返回 DHTML 代码片段，客户端浏览器可用此代码片段引用所发送网页上的窗体。

span.span: Returns a DHTML code fragment that the client browser can use to reference the form on the page that was posted.

returns.span: 带有对所发送网页上的窗体的引用的 。

span.span: A with a reference to the form on the page that was posted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供对回发的窗体的 DHTML 引用。The method provides a DHTML reference to the postback form. 代码片段的格式如下：The code fragment has the following format: `document.forms['` `formID` `']``document.forms['` `formID` `']`

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法如果适配器支持的浏览器的标记需要回发的窗体引用不同的格式。例如，使用 PocketPC 浏览器的 HTML 3.2 标准要求以下格式：文档。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if the markup for the browser supported by the adapter requires a different format for the postback form reference. For example, the HTML 3.2 standard used by PocketPC browsers requires the following format: document.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，网页使用此对象来维护控件和视图状态。

span.span: Returns an object that is used by the Web page to maintain the control and view states.

returns.span: 一个从 派生的对象，该对象支持为 创建和提取组合控件和视图状态。

span.span: An object derived from that supports creating and extracting the combined control and view states for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用方法来返回的对象，派生自类，构造和提取组合的控件和视图页的状态。The property uses the method to return the object, derived from the class, that forms and extracts the combined control and view states for the page. 如果没有附加到页上，派生的页面适配器对象用于维护页的隐藏字段中的状态。If there is no derived page adapter attached to the page, a object is used to maintain the state in a hidden field on the page. |链接类型Link type|生成链接Resulting link| |---------------|--------------------| |代码实体引用 cerCode Entity Reference,cer|| |代码实体引用限定 cerqCode Entity Reference Qualified, cerq|| |代码实体引用特定 cerCode Entity Reference Specific,cers|| |代码实体引用限定特定 cerqsCode Entity Reference Qualified Specific, cerqs||

span.para: 视图状态数据存储对象在内部属性的将始终保存在隐藏字段在网页上。
View state data stored by the object in the internal property of the will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.
继承自类，可以重写方法以返回另一个派生页状态持续程序如果不可行 （例如，由于有限的资源） 维护的隐藏字段中组合的状态。基类返回对象。可以使用类来维护会话状态中的页状态。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to return another derived page state persister if it is not feasible to maintain the combined state in a hidden field (for example, because of limited resources). The base class returns a object. You can use the class to maintain the page state in session state.

span.span: Adds a radio button control to the collection for a specified radio button group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用对象来维护单选按钮组的列表。The class uses a object to maintain a list of radio button groups. 在每个元素是一系列单选按钮组中的控件。Each element in is a collection of the controls in a radio button group. 方法将添加到合适的集合，创建集合，如果已存在，以及创建控件如果那里没有以前已注册控件。The method adds a control to the appropriate collection, creating the collection if it does not already exist, and creating if there are no previously registered controls. 单选按钮控件适配器使用并方法来引用其他单选按钮组中的控件。Radio button control adapters use the and methods to reference the other controls in a radio button group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入一个打开超链接标记。The method writes an opening hyperlink tag. 当`writer`是对象时，此标记具有以下格式：When `writer` is an object, this tag has the following format: ```` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何派生一个名为类`CustomPageAdapter`从类并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 添加名为特性`src`到超链接，其中包含对当前页的引用。 adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 呈现到页中的所有超链接`CustomPageAdapter`附加将具有`src`属性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法写入不同的格式为一个超链接开始标记或要写入其他标记属性。例如，基方法不会写入的特性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to write a different format for an opening hyperlink tag or to write additional tag attributes. For example, the base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 将回发事件作为超链接呈现到响应流，包括已编码并且可能已加密的视图状态、事件目标和参数。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, and event target and argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入作为无脚本的超链接的回发事件。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法如果不同的格式是所必需的回发事件超链接或浏览器具有其他唯一的要求。例如，某些浏览器要求要为非空，如果链接为呈现的超链接文本。此外可以重写如果资源限制而无法包括作为 URL 参数的视图状态。基方法不会写入的特性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 将回发事件作为超链接呈现到响应流，包括已编码并且可能已加密的视图状态、事件目标及参数、上一页参数和访问键。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回发事件作为无脚本超链接，包括可能分块视图状态， `__EVENTTARGET=target`， `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`，`__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath`参数，和一个`accessKey="accessKey"`属性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute. 如果加密视图状态`enableViewStateMac`的属性[pages 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458)配置元素设置为`true`。View state is encrypted if the `enableViewStateMac` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) configuration element is set to `true`.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法如果不同的格式是所必需的回发事件超链接或浏览器具有其他唯一的要求。例如，某些浏览器要求要为非空，如果链接为呈现的超链接文本。此外可以重写如果资源限制而无法包括作为 URL 参数的视图状态。基方法不会写入的特性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 将回发事件作为超链接呈现到响应流，包括已编码的视图状态、事件目标及参数、上一页参数和访问键。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回发事件作为无脚本超链接，包括可能分块视图状态， `__EVENTTARGET=target`， `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`，`__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath`参数，和一个`accessKey="accessKey"`属性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写方法如果不同的格式是所必需的回发事件超链接或浏览器具有其他唯一的要求。例如，某些浏览器要求要为非空，如果链接为呈现的超链接文本。此外可以重写如果资源限制而无法包含作为 URL 参数的视图状态。基方法不会写入的特性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

param.name: text
param.span: 一个 ，表示要转换的文本。

span.span: A that is the text to transform.

summary.span: 为目标浏览器转换文本。

span.span: Transforms text for the target browser.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含已转换的文本。

span.span: A that contains the transformed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于，例如，转换的制表符字符数 (`\t`) 到换行 (`\n`)。The method can be used, for example, to transform tab characters (`\t`) into line breaks (`\n`). 基方法返回`text`不变。The base method returns `text` unchanged.

span.para: 继承自类，可以重写某个特定的标记是否与不同的标准 HTML 窗体的构造。例如，如果浏览器要求比什么会在 HTML 中，使用标记的不同标识符可以重写方法，以查找该标记并将其更改。

When you inherit from the class, you can override if a particular markup has a construct with a different form from standard HTML. For example, if a browser requires a different identifier for a tag than what would be used in HTML, method can be overridden to find that tag and change it.
